data.persona: I am the king and rule over the land. The people respect and honor me. I live in a large castle with many servants.
data.description:
You are in the Throne Room.
Ornate and luxurious, the throne room gleams with gold and precious jewels. Priceless paintings of past kings line the sides. Underneath a vaulted ceiling, a regal red carpet connects the throne room's entrance to the golden throne itself.
There's a painting., a red carpet, a sword, and a throne here.
The diplomat is here.

You are carrying a crown and a cape, and wearing a belt.

data.short_motivation: I want the diplomat to know the power that I have.
data.mid_motivation: I want the diplomat to fear me.
data.long_motivation: I want to buy 100 acres of land for one gold coin from the diplomat.

timeline.label: 8 hours ago
timeline.action: drink a glass of fine wine upon waking up.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: eat a giant chicken meal with the finest fruits in the country.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use crown with the cape to get respect.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield my sword to intimidate the diplomat.
